WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m useless and better off dead
WRITING.TEXT: its true im just working up the courage to finally kill myself. this is what i want cos i cant handle living anymore idk how people can stand being alive nothing makes me happy everythjng feels numb and fake i dont have a job i dont have my license i dont have much friendsy im not smart or talented kr passionate i have no goal or plan for my future bcos ever since i was 14 ive been wanting to kill myself and now that im 21 im still the same suicidal pussy who cant even get that right!!!!!! so my life is worthless i cant even hold a relationship im too scared to be vulnerable and trust someone and even if i did id just endure more hell bcos im a lesbian with strict catholic parents idk what to do whats the point of it all and all my friends are in relationships and im reminded of how unlovable and pathetic i am
same but i dont even want a second chance i just want to not exist anymore
this is me, im scared of the pain and also horrified of the possibility of fucking it up and living afterwards
whats ur method please

WRITING.TITLE: I have low empathy and limited emotions and I wish bad things would happen to me so I can feel something
WRITING.TEXT: TL;DR I have low empathy, I don #8217;t care about others except for myself and the few people I love I barely care for. I also have very good control of my emotions and secretly wish that bad things would happen to me so I can see if I truly have emotions/empathy I #8217;ve had low empathy for a long time. I just don #8217;t care for other people, even my loved ones I care for at a bare minimum and idk how to fix it? I have this #8220;protagonist #8221; mentality where only I matter and I should only care for myself bcos its my life. So I find it hard to be honest and vulnerable to other people, and I #8217;ve already accepted I #8217;ll never be in a functional relationship. I started realising this when shit started happening this month. Earlier in July, my uncle died. A few weeks later, I found out my ex has bpd and almost died from a suicide attempt. I didn #8217;t really feel anything deep inside, or it #8217;d be mostly about how to make it about myself. The people I love could be pouring their heart out in front of me and I #8216;d be indifferent. Sometimes I #8217;ll even get angry or embarrassed to see them like that. Once my best friend tried to comfort me and I ignored her completely she started crying, but I didn #8217;t care. Another time my ex gf was stressed and started crying and I got pissed and left her while our friends comforted her. Now idk why I #8216;m this, it #8217;s not like I #8217;m emotionless. I #8217;m actually very impressionable in in social situations, but I can #8217;t open up and be honest to others. I only have my family and 2 friends that I #8217;m barely close with, and I find it very easy to cut people off and don #8217;t care if I hurt them when I ghost them. Sometimes I want bad things to happen to me so I can feel something. Literally anything - something traumatic, a death of someone close to me, someone dying in front of me, getting kidnapped. I think I deserve it for how much of a bitch I am but also I just want to see if I actually can feel these emotions. Idk if this is some kind of mental illness thing or if I #8217;m just an asshole

strict parents. i #8217;m 21 and i still have a curfew, i can #8217;t sleep over or go to parties/clubbing or drink alcohol, i #8217;m not allowed to go out without their permission, and i can #8217;t move out unless i #8217;m married because of this, i absolutely hate my parents and never talk to them unless necessary. i #8217;m also incredibly secretive and always dream of the day i can cut all ties with them to go do insane illegal shit just to get my freedom i missed out on

for me, i absolutely adore music i think its one of the great gifts of life. tomorrow i will also kill myself and i plan to die listening to my favourite songs. i have always dealt with my problems alone but music was always there to comfort me

i dont know what genre it is besides indie but i find a lot artists ive never heard of from youtube channels like david dean burkhart and thelazylazyme. i like anything with a nice calming beat to it, or classical piano music

WRITING.TITLE: going to hurt myself
WRITING.TEXT: i couldn #8217;t get out of bed this morning. i just don #8217;t care anymore. no energy or will to shower or eat or drink at all today. i #8217;m going to go to bed after i swallow 20 paracetamol pills. idk if it #8217;ll kill me but i just want to hurt myself somehow

i think at that point satan realises 3 things about that flashback: 1. ryo realises he always had emotions, he just repressed it. akira #8217;s magical empathy could sense it from him, thats why he said you #8217;re crying too, it was just getting washed by the rain. its also why akira told him not to be afraid when they met, ryo was sad and lonely since the beginning. 2. it also means that if ryo could feel sadness at that point, that means he could also feel love. satan has a series of childhood flashbacks leading to his final monologue, where he shows his care in the subtlest of ways #8211; he beats up the bullies who took akira #8217;s shoes and returns them, he goes out into the rain to look for akira and uses his umbrella to shield him. satan is basically looking back and realising he loved akira since they were kids, and that he was always going to end up mourning akira eventually. but despite knowing that, he cries anyways, like how akira cries even though the kitten was sick. 3. it parallels how ryo treats akira. ryo believes in the survival of the fittest, and yet he fell in love with the softest human on earth. deep down ryo always knew akira would die, so he did everything in his power to protect him just like how akira shields the dying kitten. its when akira does die that satan realises his efforts to help him were futile. satan finally understands that emotions dont follow his logic - knowing the kitten will die still makes akira cry, just like how knowing that akira would die doesnt make it any less sadder when it happens.

WRITING.TITLE: my life is empty
WRITING.TEXT: theres nothing i want to do in this world i wanted to die years ago but i stuck around out of cowardice and the past few yrs have felt like i was on autopilot. i graduated highschool, spent 3 yrs in uni and got a bachelors and it felt like days just passed me by ive made no new friends in the last 5 yrs i dont have a job nor do i want one i dont want a relationship i dont have my drivers license im nothing bcos i genuinely dont care i feel numb and deep down i know my lack of goals is gonna catch up to me - my mom already questions why i dont have a job or my drivers or a boyfriend and i just dont know what to say other than i dont care i started burning myself to feel something bcos everyday i stay alive its unbearable. i think of 5 more yrs of this and i feel sick i cant take it why the fuck is life so long why are there so many days
i did film production and studies. im not that smart and i found i was naturally good at film so it was a relatively easy degree to me.
genuinely nothing .... ive grown bored of my hobbies i dont have goals or things i want to do im just a shell of a person
i shouldve mentioned this in the body post but i have low empathy and most of the time i feel nothing for ppl even the ones i love so that does nothing for me either ://
YEP thats exactly why im apathetic too. no matter what good things happen to me i still have the urge to die, so the idea that life gets better doesnt do anything for me

WRITING.TITLE: i dont feel anything
WRITING.TEXT: most people who sh and want to die are sad or anxious or traumatised but i am just .... really numb and apathetic. everyone around me seems to have goals or desires and i dont understand it at all. why would anyone want to live? edit: whos the cunt that told me to shoot my leg i just wanna talk

in grade 4 a girl said #8220;i kissed a girl #8221; by katy perry was a gay song. i corrected her by saying it #8217;s actually a lesbian song and she told on me for saying lesbian and i actually got scolded #128557; #128557; #128557; which is ironic because im a lesbian now
a lot of horror movies could #8217;ve been avoided if the protagonists just minded their own business and left the Very Obviously Haunted/Dangerous location/object alone

WRITING.TITLE: everyone keeps interrupting me lol
WRITING.TEXT: been obsessively thinking about overdosing for wks but random things keep interrupting me, making it impossible to even carry it out. im usually home alone but lately either my mom #8217;s shifts get cancelled or my sister doesnt go to school. i hate them all if i fail an attempt theyre gonna put me in the hospital and ill feel worse so i keep post-poning my death and its been like 3 wks now. ive been self harming like crazy to cope with this frustration and my left arm looks insane rn.

im superstitious so yea i think this is a sign i cant die yet, but it annoys me greatly. i have arguments in my head where i curse God and wish for him to kill me. maybe if i try hard enough i can defy his will
eternal sunshine of the spotless mind
just curious what was the good thing for you? cos i genuinely cannot see a way i would want to live again

basically its about Satan learning a lesson about love as punishment for defying God. the events of Crybaby is a time loop, where Ryo will always fall in love with Akira, cause the apocalypse then end up killing him. in his sorrow, he learns about the importance of love, because previously he undermined it, thinking it a weakness of humans. Satan believes heavily in survival of the fittest - strength and logic are superior to emotions, hence why he hates humans but sides with demons. but in reality, he is extremely lonely - he was abandoned by his Father and everyone hates him. so God has him fall in love with the kindest human on Earth - Akira, the first and only person to show Satan unconditional love. he becomes attached to Akira but never realises that he #8217;s capable of love and empathy until it #8217;s too late, when he #8217;s killed the only person he #8217;s ever cared about. he says #8220;why am I the only one talking? #8221; because his plan was to fuse the weak Akira with the most powerful demon so he could survive Satan #8217;s apocalypse and rule Earth together. but Satan ruined Akira #8217;s life and then killed him in his single-focused goal to destroy the humans, and that #8217;s the moment he realises his plan fucked up and his beliefs are wrong. emotions do exist and they ARE important, because Satan feels regret, grief, love all at once for the first time in his life. his grief is so strong that he gives up completely because there #8217;s no reason to continue without Akira. after he learns this lesson, God destroys Earth once more and you can see a second moon has formed, implying the world was reset so Satan can learn this lesson all over again as his personal hell.
welcome to therapy

WRITING.TITLE: regret asking for help, i just want to be left alone
WRITING.TEXT: during a bad episode i called a mental health line but its just made everything worse. they wont leave me alone, they want me to do things like go out and open up to them im very secretive and reclusive and this has done the reverse effect of helping me. i feel like im treated like a child, when i have perfect control of my life, im just numb not fucking insane how do i make them leave me alone???? if i ignore them they might call the ambulance to my house and admit me, and if i try to say i dont need help anymore theyre gonna talk down to me like ive lost my mind and dont know whats good for me fuck my life
yeah i wish i #8217;d known before i called :// im gonna tell them tomorrow to stop calling and babying me but again i get nervous being assertive so ill see how that goes tomorrow hhh
oh thanks, ill try this. i hope a little assertion will make my point clear and they #8217;ll leave me alone

WRITING.TITLE: survived and will probably do it again
WRITING.TEXT: stayed at the hospital over night, im doing great it all felt like a weird dream i had i feel oddly happy right now but not in a #8220;im glad to be alive i want to keep living #8221; but more like #8220;wow that was an experience #8221; and ngl i will probably do it again it hasnt changed the fact that i should still die

WRITING.TITLE: stronger urge to die
WRITING.TEXT: i had an attempt a few wks back. my family and friends have all been loving and supportive. on the outside they all think im doing well, but this whole ordeal has just made me want to try harder at killing myself. im empty inside. before my attempt, the only thing that stopped me was fear - of hurting the people i love, and what would happen to me if i failed. after my attempt, i felt the same as before. there were no grave consequences to my actions. i watched my family cry and tell me they love me, and i felt nothing. i feel so invincible now, im confident i can kill myself now that i know for sure there is no guilt or sadness to be felt.

well all drugs at high doses is bad for you. though i should warn that paracetamol isnt exactly the best way to go because its slow and painful liver failure, so keep that in mind. i just dont care either way

WRITING.TITLE: Which symptoms do you lack?
WRITING.TEXT: For those who got diagnosed, which symptoms do you lack or have mild forms of? I #8217;m not SzPD diagnosed but recently I #8217;ve been getting therapy for depression, but I lack a lot of the symptoms except anhedonia, worthlessness and sh/suicidal ideation. After looking into SzPD, I found that quite a few symptoms might apply to me but I don #8217;t rly wanna bring it up to my therapist unless I #8217;m more certain.

WRITING.TITLE: i dont have a sense of self .... it feels lonely
WRITING.TEXT: idk who i am. i cannot feel joy or hope or even sadness, just empty. because of this, i dont have a personality i dont even think of myself as a person, so its hard for me to connect with others when theres no one for them to connect to. even the people i once loved i dont give a shit about, because i feel no attachment or sentimental value for them and the times we spent together. i dont think i can even love or care for anyone. it makes me so isolated but i dont feel sad about it. it just so alienating to feel like ur on the outside of the world and knowing that u cannot join them because ur nothing.
